title: Wave Fizz Ambient Water, Sparkling Or Cold Water Dispenser
item_description:
Wave Fizz Ambient Water, Sparkling Or Cold Water Dispenser

  • Manufacturer: Blupura
  • Model Number: WAVE FIZZ 60 VOL
  • Voltage: 115 Volts
  • Width: 19”
  • Length: 12.5”
  • Height: 18”
  • Photos are representative of this lot.
  • Wave Fizz Cold, Sparkling Or Ambient Water Dispenser. Up to 18 liters of chilled, ambient or sparkling water. Dispensing into branded glass bottles you can serve your clients/guests in style.
  • Seller States That This Lot Is in Working Conditions. Dolly Is Not Included. Key Not available
